attributes.action: Referral to a clinic within the NHS letter is misleading.
attributes.additional_details: The Department for Health and Social Care should change the wording on letters of referral so members of society are not mislead. Put in place a procedure to remove the local hospital number, which have little control over appointments and make referrals simple. Therefore saving time, resources and money.
attributes.background: Change the way NHS referral letters are sent.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

This is an operational matter for individual hospitals and other NHS care settings.
